name: Carnivores Dinosaur Hunter - dino hunter simulator, free dinosaur hunting games
name_original: Carnivores Dinosaur Hunter - dino hunter simulator, free dinosaur hunting games
description:
Carnivores Dinosaur Hunter is the 3D carnivores dino hunter hunting game with great 3d graphics.

- Tilt & Touch controls.
- Amazing graphics and sound effects.
- 3 different style scene.
- unlock new weapons and scene by hunting the dinosaur.
